definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
sb who goes whichever way the wind blows/sb with no mind of their own/easily swayed person/opportunist
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to puff up/to swell up/to inflate/to blow air into sth/(fig.) to encourage/to support
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: to ask a question, already knowing the answer
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities

definition: ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
